metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4167 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Incorrect Authorization check affecting all versions of GitLab EE from 13.11 prior to 15.5.7, 15.6 prior to 15.6.4, and 15.7 prior to 15.7.2 allows group access tokens to continue working even after the group owner loses the ability to revoke them.

criterions.comment: check: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
